Key Match Events: Bukayo Saka scored the equalizer in the 80th minute to send the match to extra time
Switzerland took a 1-0 lead in the 75th minute
Jordan Pickford made a stop in the opening round of penalty kicks
England advanced to the semifinals after a 5-4 penalty shootout win over Switzerland
Pre-Game Insights: England manager Gareth Southgate disagreed with the notion that his team had an easy path to the final
Southgate emphasized the strength and preparation of Switzerland
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate praised his teamâ€™s resilience after coming back from 1-0 down
England will face the winner of the Netherlands-Turkey match in the semifinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match went to extra time after being scoreless until the 80th minute
Both teams failed to score in the first half of extra time
